statements: DELETE FROM TrafficInformation WHERE location_id = 1 AND traffic_status = 'Heavy';
DELETE FROM TrafficInformation WHERE road_condition = 'Wet' AND weather_condition = 'Rainy';
DELETE FROM traffic_updates WHERE update_time < '2021-09-01' AND condition_id = (SELECT condition_id FROM traffic_conditions WHERE location = 'City Center' AND traffic_level > 5);
DELETE FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE speed < 50 AND traffic_congestion = true;
DELETE FROM traffic_reports WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM navigation_systems WHERE system_name = 'Google Maps';
